entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add API for modifying value on row update #29464
  • Using Postgres mapped enum as type discriminator causes re-creation of records in migrations #29461
  • Nullable owned entity with nested owned entity always NOT NULL #29457

Closed

  • Throw more specific exceptions from ShapedQueryCompilingExpressionVisitor #29446
  • Global Query Filters for Owned Entities #29283
  • Data Annotations not overriding configurationBuilder properties #29453
  • Static value objects causes InvalidOperationException when using the value object instead of primitive type in predicates #29405

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.31.0 to 3.31.1 #29463
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • !fixup! Correct CodeQL3000 setup #29458
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
  • [release/2.1] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29440
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29439
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to efcore-ci-official #29438
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
